blocks.name: ifeqeqx
blocks.content: An equality theorem tailored for ~ ballotlemsf1o . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ifeqeqx(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1))), wceq(cv(s1), cif(c2, c3, w2)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c3, cv(s1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cv(s1), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w1), w3)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
} = {
  ifbothda(c2, c3, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1))), wceq(cv(s1), cif(c2, c3, w2)), w2, wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3))
  eqeq2(c2, cif(c2, c3, w2), cv(s1))
  eqeq2(c3, cif(c2, c3, w2), cv(s1))
  sylc(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1))), w2), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c2)))
  sylc(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1))), w2), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c2)), w0, wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2))
  simpll(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), w2)
  sylc(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1))), w2), wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2), wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), w2)
  simplr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), w2)
  simpr(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1))), w2)
  biimpd(wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), w2, wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2))
  ifbothda(c0, c1, w0, wi(wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c2))), w1, wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w2), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c2))), wi(wsbc(s0, c1, w2), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c1, c2))))
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w1)), wsbc(s0, c0, w2), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c2)))
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c2), wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w1)))
  csbeq1(s0, c0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c2)
  imbi12d(wceq(c1, cif(c0, c1, w1)), wsbc(s0, c1, w2), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c1, c2)), wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c2)))
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), csb(s0, c1, c2), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c2), wceq(c1, cif(c0, c1, w1)))
  csbeq1(s0, c1, cif(c0, c1, w1), c2)
  a1d(wa(w0, w1), wsbc(s0, c0, w2), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  eqcomd(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c2), wa(w0, w1))
  adantr(w0, w1, wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), cv(s1)))
  eqtr4d(csb(s0, c0, c2), cv(s1), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), c4), wcel(c0, c6))
  csbiegf(s0, c0, c6, c2, c4)
  nfcvd(s0, c4, wcel(c0, c6))
  ex(wa(w0, wn(w1)), wsbc(s0, c1, w2), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c1, c2)))
  anass1rs(w0, wn(w1), wsbc(s0, c1, w2), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c1, c2)))
  imp(w0, wa(wsbc(s0, c1, w2), wn(w1)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c1, c2)))
  pm2.21d(w0, wa(wsbc(s0, c1, w2), wn(w1)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c1, c2)))
  mtbiri(w0, wa(wsbc(s0, c1, w2), wn(w1)), wa(w1, wn(w1)))
  anbi1d(w0, wsbc(s0, c1, w2), wn(w1), w1)
  syl(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c1, w2), w1), wcel(c1, c5))
  sbcieg(s0, c1, c5, w2, w1)
  biimprd(wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c2)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), c2, csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c2)
  sylc(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1))), wn(w2)), wceq(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c3)))
  sylc(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1))), wn(w2)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c3)), w0, wn(wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2)))
  simpll(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), wn(w2))
  sylc(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1))), wn(w2)), wn(wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2)), wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), wn(w2))
  simplr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), wn(w2))
  simpr(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1))), wn(w2))
  biimpd(wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), wn(w2), wn(wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2)))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), w2, wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2))
  sbceq1a(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2)
  ifbothda(c0, c1, w0, wi(wn(wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c3))), w1, wi(wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w2)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c3))), wi(wn(wsbc(s0, c1, w2)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c1, c3))))
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w1)), wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w2)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wn(wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c3)))
  notbid(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w1)), wsbc(s0, c0, w2), wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2))
  dfsbcq(s0, c0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2)
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c3), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c3), wceq(c0, cif(c0, c1, w1)))
  csbeq1(s0, c0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c3)
  imbi12d(wceq(c1, cif(c0, c1, w1)), wn(wsbc(s0, c1, w2)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c1, c3)), wn(wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c3)))
  notbid(wceq(c1, cif(c0, c1, w1)), wsbc(s0, c1, w2), wsbc(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2))
  dfsbcq(s0, c1, cif(c0, c1, w1), w2)
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), csb(s0, c1, c3), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c3), wceq(c1, cif(c0, c1, w1)))
  csbeq1(s0, c1, cif(c0, c1, w1), c3)
  expdimp(w0, w1, wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w2)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c3)))
  pm2.21d(w0, wa(w1, wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w2))), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, c3)))
  mtoi(w0, wa(w1, wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w2))), wa(w1, wn(w1)))
  pm3.24(w1)
  anim2d(w0, w1, wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w2)), wn(w1))
  nsyld(w0, wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w2)), w1, w3)
  biimpd(w0, wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w2)), wn(w3))
  notbid(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w2), w3)
  syl(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w2), w3), wcel(c0, c6))
  sbcieg(s0, c0, c6, w2, w3)
  ex(w0, w1, w3)
  a1d(wa(w0, wn(w1)), wn(wsbc(s0, c1, w2)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, c1, c3)))
  eqcomd(cv(s1), csb(s0, c1, c3), wa(w0, wn(w1)))
  adantr(w0, wn(w1), wceq(csb(s0, c1, c3), cv(s1)))
  syl(w0, wceq(csb(s0, c1, c3), cv(s1)), wcel(c1, c5))
  csbiegf(s0, c1, c5, c3, cv(s1))
  nfcvd(s0, cv(s1), wcel(c1, c5))
  biimprd(wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)), wceq(cv(s1), csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c3)), wceq(cv(s1), c3))
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), c3, csb(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cif(c0, c1, w1)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cif(c0, c1, w1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ifeqeqx(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ s0 = if(w1, c0, c1))→ s1 = if(w2, c2, c3))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c2 = c4)
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 → c3 = s1)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w2 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 →(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → s1 = c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ w1)→ w3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
} = {
  ifbothda(c2, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 = if(w1, c0, c1)), s1 = if(w2, c2, c3), w2, s1 = c2, s1 = c3)
  eqeq2(c2, if(w2, c2, c3), s1)
  eqeq2(c3, if(w2, c2, c3), s1)
  sylc(((w0 ∧ s0 = if(w1, c0, c1))∧ w2), s1 = c2, s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), s1 =[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c2)
  sylc(((w0 ∧ s0 = if(w1, c0, c1))∧ w2), s1 =[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c2, w0, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2)
  simpll(w0, s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), w2)
  sylc(((w0 ∧ s0 = if(w1, c0, c1))∧ w2), [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2, s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), w2)
  simplr(w0, s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), w2)
  simpr((w0 ∧ s0 = if(w1, c0, c1)), w2)
  biimpd(s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), w2, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2)
  ifbothda(c0, c1, w0, ([if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2 → s1 =[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c2), w1, ([c0 / s0]w2 → s1 =[c0 / s0]c2), ([c1 / s0]w2 → s1 =[c1 / s0]c2))
  imbi12d(c0 = if(w1, c0, c1), [c0 / s0]w2, s1 =[c0 / s0]c2, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2, s1 =[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c2)
  eqeq2d(s1, [c0 / s0]c2, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c2, c0 = if(w1, c0, c1))
  csbeq1(s0, c0, if(w1, c0, c1), c2)
  imbi12d(c1 = if(w1, c0, c1), [c1 / s0]w2, s1 =[c1 / s0]c2, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2, s1 =[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c2)
  eqeq2d(s1, [c1 / s0]c2, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c2, c1 = if(w1, c0, c1))
  csbeq1(s0, c1, if(w1, c0, c1), c2)
  a1d((w0 ∧ w1), [c0 / s0]w2, s1 =[c0 / s0]c2)
  eqcomd(s1, [c0 / s0]c2, (w0 ∧ w1))
  adantr(w0, w1, [c0 / s0]c2 = s1)
  eqtr4d([c0 / s0]c2, s1, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, [c0 / s0]c2 = c4, c0 ∈ c6)
  csbiegf(s0, c0, c6, c2, c4)
  nfcvd(s0, c4, c0 ∈ c6)
  ex((w0 ∧ ¬ w1), [c1 / s0]w2, s1 =[c1 / s0]c2)
  anass1rs(w0, ¬ w1, [c1 / s0]w2, s1 =[c1 / s0]c2)
  imp(w0, ([c1 / s0]w2 ∧ ¬ w1), s1 =[c1 / s0]c2)
  pm2.21d(w0, ([c1 / s0]w2 ∧ ¬ w1), s1 =[c1 / s0]c2)
  mtbiri(w0, ([c1 / s0]w2 ∧ ¬ w1), (w1 ∧ ¬ w1))
  anbi1d(w0, [c1 / s0]w2, ¬ w1, w1)
  syl(w0, ([c1 / s0]w2 ↔ w1), c1 ∈ c5)
  sbcieg(s0, c1, c5, w2, w1)
  biimprd(s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), s1 =[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c2, s1 = c2)
  eqeq2d(s1, c2, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c2, s0 = if(w1, c0, c1))
  csbeq1a(s0, if(w1, c0, c1), c2)
  sylc(((w0 ∧ s0 = if(w1, c0, c1))∧ ¬ w2), s1 = c3, s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), s1 =[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c3)
  sylc(((w0 ∧ s0 = if(w1, c0, c1))∧ ¬ w2), s1 =[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c3, w0, ¬[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2)
  simpll(w0, s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), ¬ w2)
  sylc(((w0 ∧ s0 = if(w1, c0, c1))∧ ¬ w2), ¬[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2, s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), ¬ w2)
  simplr(w0, s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), ¬ w2)
  simpr((w0 ∧ s0 = if(w1, c0, c1)), ¬ w2)
  biimpd(s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), ¬ w2, ¬[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2)
  notbid(s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), w2, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2)
  sbceq1a(s0, if(w1, c0, c1), w2)
  ifbothda(c0, c1, w0, (¬[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2 → s1 =[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c3), w1, (¬[c0 / s0]w2 → s1 =[c0 / s0]c3), (¬[c1 / s0]w2 → s1 =[c1 / s0]c3))
  imbi12d(c0 = if(w1, c0, c1), ¬[c0 / s0]w2, s1 =[c0 / s0]c3, ¬[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2, s1 =[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c3)
  notbid(c0 = if(w1, c0, c1), [c0 / s0]w2, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2)
  dfsbcq(s0, c0, if(w1, c0, c1), w2)
  eqeq2d(s1, [c0 / s0]c3, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c3, c0 = if(w1, c0, c1))
  csbeq1(s0, c0, if(w1, c0, c1), c3)
  imbi12d(c1 = if(w1, c0, c1), ¬[c1 / s0]w2, s1 =[c1 / s0]c3, ¬[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2, s1 =[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c3)
  notbid(c1 = if(w1, c0, c1), [c1 / s0]w2, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]w2)
  dfsbcq(s0, c1, if(w1, c0, c1), w2)
  eqeq2d(s1, [c1 / s0]c3, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c3, c1 = if(w1, c0, c1))
  csbeq1(s0, c1, if(w1, c0, c1), c3)
  expdimp(w0, w1, ¬[c0 / s0]w2, s1 =[c0 / s0]c3)
  pm2.21d(w0, (w1 ∧ ¬[c0 / s0]w2), s1 =[c0 / s0]c3)
  mtoi(w0, (w1 ∧ ¬[c0 / s0]w2), (w1 ∧ ¬ w1))
  pm3.24(w1)
  anim2d(w0, w1, ¬[c0 / s0]w2, ¬ w1)
  nsyld(w0, ¬[c0 / s0]w2, w1, w3)
  biimpd(w0, ¬[c0 / s0]w2, ¬ w3)
  notbid(w0, [c0 / s0]w2, w3)
  syl(w0, ([c0 / s0]w2 ↔ w3), c0 ∈ c6)
  sbcieg(s0, c0, c6, w2, w3)
  ex(w0, w1, w3)
  a1d((w0 ∧ ¬ w1), ¬[c1 / s0]w2, s1 =[c1 / s0]c3)
  eqcomd(s1, [c1 / s0]c3, (w0 ∧ ¬ w1))
  adantr(w0, ¬ w1, [c1 / s0]c3 = s1)
  syl(w0, [c1 / s0]c3 = s1, c1 ∈ c5)
  csbiegf(s0, c1, c5, c3, s1)
  nfcvd(s0, s1, c1 ∈ c5)
  biimprd(s0 = if(w1, c0, c1), s1 =[if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c3, s1 = c3)
  eqeq2d(s1, c3, [if(w1, c0, c1)/ s0]c3, s0 = if(w1, c0, c1))
  csbeq1a(s0, if(w1, c0, c1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: elimifd
blocks.content: Elimination of a conditional operator contained in a wff ` ch ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm elimifd(class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(w1, wo(wa(w2, w3), wa(wn(w2), w4))))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cif(c0, c1, w2), c0), wb(w1, w3)))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cif(c0, c1, w2), c1), wb(w1, w4)))
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, w1, wo(wa(w2, w3), wa(wn(w2), w4)), wa(wo(w2, wn(w2)), w1), wo(wa(w2, w1), wa(wn(w2), w1)))
  a1i(w0, wb(w1, wa(wo(w2, wn(w2)), w1)))
  biantrur(w1, wo(w2, wn(w2)))
  exmid(w2)
  a1i(w0, wb(wa(wo(w2, wn(w2)), w1), wo(wa(w2, w1), wa(wn(w2), w1))))
  andir(w2, wn(w2), w1)
  orbi12d(w0, wa(w2, w1), wa(wn(w2), w1), wa(w2, w3), wa(wn(w2), w4))
  pm5.32d(w0, w2, w1, w3)
  syl5(w0, w2, wb(w1, w3), wceq(cif(c0, c1, w2), c0))
  iftrue(c0, c1, w2)
  pm5.32d(w0, wn(w2), w1, w4)
  syl5(w0, wn(w2), wb(w1, w4), wceq(cif(c0, c1, w2), c1))
  iffalse(c0, c1, w2)
}

blocks.name: elim2if
blocks.content: Elimination of two conditional operators contained in a wff ` ch ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm elim2if(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wb(w0, wo(wa(w1, w2), wa(wn(w1), wo(wa(w3, w4), wa(wn(w3), w5)))))
  -| wi(wceq(cif(c0, cif(c1, c2, w3), w1), c0), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cif(c0, cif(c1, c2, w3), w1), c1), wb(w0, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cif(c0, cif(c1, c2, w3), w1), c2), wb(w0, w5))
} = {
  cases(w0, w1, w2, wo(wa(w3, w4), wa(wn(w3), w5)))
  syl(w1, wb(w0, w2), wceq(cif(c0, cif(c1, c2, w3), w1), c0))
  iftrue(c0, cif(c1, c2, w3), w1)
  elimifd(c1, c2, wn(w1), w0, w3, w4, w5)
  syl6bir(wn(w1), wceq(cif(c1, c2, w3), c1), wb(w0, w4), wceq(cif(c0, cif(c1, c2, w3), w1), c1))
  eqeq1d(cif(c0, cif(c1, c2, w3), w1), c1, cif(c1, c2, w3), wn(w1))
  syl6bir(wn(w1), wceq(cif(c1, c2, w3), c2), wb(w0, w5), wceq(cif(c0, cif(c1, c2, w3), w1), c2))
  eqeq1d(cif(c0, cif(c1, c2, w3), w1), c2, cif(c1, c2, w3), wn(w1))
  iffalse(c0, cif(c1, c2, w3), w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elim2if(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  ⊢ (w0 ↔((w1 ∧ w2)∨(¬ w1 ∧((w3 ∧ w4)∨(¬ w3 ∧ w5)))))
  ⊣ (if(w1, c0, if(w3, c1, c2))= c0 →(w0 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (if(w1, c0, if(w3, c1, c2))= c1 →(w0 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (if(w1, c0, if(w3, c1, c2))= c2 →(w0 ↔ w5))
} = {
  cases(w0, w1, w2, ((w3 ∧ w4)∨(¬ w3 ∧ w5)))
  syl(w1, (w0 ↔ w2), if(w1, c0, if(w3, c1, c2))= c0)
  iftrue(c0, if(w3, c1, c2), w1)
  elimifd(c1, c2, ¬ w1, w0, w3, w4, w5)
  syl6bir(¬ w1, if(w3, c1, c2)= c1, (w0 ↔ w4), if(w1, c0, if(w3, c1, c2))= c1)
  eqeq1d(if(w1, c0, if(w3, c1, c2)), c1, if(w3, c1, c2), ¬ w1)
  syl6bir(¬ w1, if(w3, c1, c2)= c2, (w0 ↔ w5), if(w1, c0, if(w3, c1, c2))= c2)
  eqeq1d(if(w1, c0, if(w3, c1, c2)), c2, if(w3, c1, c2), ¬ w1)
  iffalse(c0, if(w3, c1, c2), w1)
}

blocks.name: elim2ifim
blocks.content: Elimination of two conditional operators for an implication. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm elim2ifim(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- w0
  -| wi(wceq(cif(c0, cif(c1, c2, w2), w1), c0), wb(w0, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cif(c0, cif(c1, c2, w2), w1), c1), wb(w0, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cif(c0, cif(c1, c2, w2), w1), c2), wb(w0, w5))
  -| wi(w1, w3)
  -| wi(wa(wn(w1), w2), w4)
  -| wi(wa(wn(w1), wn(w2)), w5)
} = {
  mpbir(w0, wo(wa(w1, w3), wa(wn(w1), wo(wa(w2, w4), wa(wn(w2), w5)))))
  ax-mp(wo(wa(w1, w3), wa(wn(w1), wo(wa(w2, w4), wa(wn(w2), w5)))), wo(w1, wn(w1)))
  exmid(w1)
  orim12i(w1, wn(w1), wa(w1, w3), wa(wn(w1), wo(wa(w2, w4), wa(wn(w2), w5))))
  ancli(w1, w3)
  ancli(wn(w1), wo(wa(w2, w4), wa(wn(w2), w5)))
  sylbi(wn(w1), wo(wa(w2, w4), wa(wn(w2), w5)), wo(wa(wn(w1), w2), wa(wn(w1), wn(w2))))
  pm4.42(wn(w1), w2)
  orim12i(wa(wn(w1), w2), wa(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wa(w2, w4), wa(wn(w2), w5))
  imp(wn(w1), w2, wa(w2, w4))
  ancld(wn(w1), w2, w4)
  ex(wn(w1), w2, w4)
  imp(wn(w1), wn(w2), wa(wn(w2), w5))
  ancld(wn(w1), wn(w2), w5)
  ex(wn(w1), wn(w2), w5)
  elim2if(c0, c1, c2, w0, w1, w3, w2, w4, w5)
}

blocks.name: ifeq3da
blocks.content: Given an expression ` C ` containing ` if ( ps , E , F ) ` , substitute (hypotheses .1 and .2) and evaluate (hypotheses .3 and .4) it for both cases at the same time. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm ifeq3da(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cif(c0, c1, w1), c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cif(c3, c4, w1), c3), wceq(c2, c5))
  -| wi(wceq(cif(c3, c4, w1), c4), wceq(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c6, c1))
} = {
  ifeqda(c0, c1, c2, w0, w1)
  eqtr2d(c0, c2, c5, wa(w0, w1))
  adantl(w0, w1, wceq(c2, c5))
  syl(w1, wceq(c2, c5), wceq(cif(c3, c4, w1), c3))
  iftrue(c3, c4, w1)
  adantr(w0, w1, wceq(c5, c0))
  eqtr2d(c1, c2, c6, wa(w0, wn(w1)))
  adantl(w0, wn(w1), wceq(c2, c6))
  syl(wn(w1), wceq(c2, c6), wceq(cif(c3, c4, w1), c4))
  iffalse(c3, c4, w1)
  adantr(w0, wn(w1), wceq(c6, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ifeq3da(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → if(w1, c0, c1)= c2)
  ⊣ (if(w1, c3, c4)= c3 → c2 = c5)
  ⊣ (if(w1, c3, c4)= c4 → c2 = c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 = c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 = c1)
} = {
  ifeqda(c0, c1, c2, w0, w1)
  eqtr2d(c0, c2, c5, (w0 ∧ w1))
  adantl(w0, w1, c2 = c5)
  syl(w1, c2 = c5, if(w1, c3, c4)= c3)
  iftrue(c3, c4, w1)
  adantr(w0, w1, c5 = c0)
  eqtr2d(c1, c2, c6, (w0 ∧ ¬ w1))
  adantl(w0, ¬ w1, c2 = c6)
  syl(¬ w1, c2 = c6, if(w1, c3, c4)= c4)
  iffalse(c3, c4, w1)
  adantr(w0, ¬ w1, c6 = c1)
}
